text:
DMK men thwarted an attempt to load boxes containing Amma Baby Care Kits on a vehicle from a hospital campus here on Tuesday.

After the DMK men protested, the cargo carrier left without loading the kits that had chief minister J.Jayalalithaa’s picture on it, sources said. N. Palani of DMK’s legal wing wrote to the Returning officer of Tiruvannamalai constituency and RDO R.Umamaheswari to seize about 50,000 kits that were stored in the chest in the hospital and distributed in violation of the code of conduct.

He also wanted action against erring officials and AIADMK men who violate the code of conduct.
title: DMK men prevent distribution of baby care kits
